title: Business Analyst Transitioning to AI & Machine Learning
subtitle: Cheatsheet for an Employee Development Plan

items.name: Data Analysis and Visualization
items.description: Strong foundation in data analytics, essential for AI applications in business

items.name: Python for Data Science
items.description: Proficiency in Python programming for data manipulation, analysis, and modeling

items.name: Statistical Analysis and Probability
items.description: Understanding key statistical concepts used in machine learning algorithms

items.name: Machine Learning Fundamentals
items.description: Knowledge of core ML algorithms and concepts, such as regression, classification, and clustering

items.name: Business Applications of AI
items.description: Identifying practical AI applications for business problems and opportunities

items.name: Deep Learning Basics
items.description: Introduction to neural networks, deep learning, and frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch

items.name: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
items.description: Using NLP techniques to analyze and derive insights from text data in business contexts

items.name: Python and Jupyter Notebook
items.description: Core tools for data science and machine learning experimentation

items.name: SQL for Data Extraction
items.description: Essential skill for accessing and manipulating data in databases

items.name: Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit-Learn
items.description: Python libraries for data manipulation, numerical analysis, and machine learning

items.name: Power BI and Tableau
items.description: Data visualization tools for communicating insights from ML models

items.name: TensorFlow and Keras
items.description: Deep learning frameworks for building neural networks

items.name: Data Science Professional Certificate
items.description: Foundational data science certification

items.name: Machine Learning for Business
items.description: Course focused on practical ML applications in business

items.name: Python for Data Science and AI
items.description: Covers Python programming for data science tasks

items.name: AI for Everyone
items.description: Introduction to AI concepts for business professionals

items.name: Deep Learning Specialization
items.description: Comprehensive series on deep learning techniques

items.name: Natural Language Processing with Python
items.description: Hands-on NLP course using Python

items.name: Cross-Functional Collaboration
items.description: Experience collaborating with teams across different business units

items.name: Data Storytelling
items.description: Ability to explain data insights and model results in a clear, compelling way

items.name: Technical Writing for Non-Technical Stakeholders
items.description: Writing documentation and reports that are accessible to non-technical audiences

items.name: AI Ethics and Responsible AI Communication
items.description: Understanding and communicating the ethical considerations of AI applications

career_scenarios.name: Data Scientist in Business Intelligence
career_scenarios.description: Apply machine learning techniques to generate insights and improve business intelligence.
career_scenarios.notes: Develop a portfolio of ML projects focused on business problems, and strengthen Python and SQL skills.

career_scenarios.name: Machine Learning Engineer for Business Applications
career_scenarios.description: Design and deploy machine learning models to solve business challenges.
career_scenarios.notes: Gain experience with ML deployment pipelines, and focus on business-specific use cases in ML model development.

career_scenarios.name: Product Manager in AI Solutions
career_scenarios.description: Manage the development of AI-powered products tailored for business applications.
career_scenarios.notes: Develop expertise in product management, particularly for tech products, and build understanding of user-centric AI solutions.

career_scenarios.name: AI Consultant for Business Transformation
career_scenarios.description: Advise companies on implementing AI to drive digital transformation and improve business operations.
career_scenarios.notes: Focus on building consulting skills, understanding business challenges, and identifying how AI can address these needs effectively.
